revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: The 3rd year of Antoninus and Verus the Lords Augusti, Pharmouthi, for the account of Phamenoth. Paid to Priscus and the associate collectors of money taxes by Pakebkis son of Harpokration, son of N.N. for poll-tax of the 2nd year at Tebtunis 22 drachmas 4 obols, total 22 drachmas 4 obols. The 3rd year of Imperator Caesar Marcus Aurelius Antoninus Augustus and Imperator Caesar Lucius Aurelius Verus Augustus, for the account of Pharmouthi. Paid to Priscus and the associate collectors of money taxes by N.N. son of N.N. for the charge for the epistates of priests for the 3rd year at Tebtunis three hundred and forty drachmas, total 340 dr., with 24 drachmas 3 ob. for extra charges and 3 ob. for the receipt. In the 4th year, Thoth, the same man (has paid) two hundred seventy two drachmas, total 272 dr., with 23 dr. 1 ob. for extra charges and 3 ob. for the receipt.

listBibl.bibl: P.Tebt., II.306 The correction to line 11 in BL v. 3, p. 241, should be discarded. The reading of the edition is correct.
